QuestData.Title: Sanctifying Ground
QuestData.Description:
We are so close to weakening dis herald, $n. Dis is our final push. De nearby area is brimming with blood magic.
While you were fighting, I was working on creating totems dat can cleanse de area of blood magic.
Take dese totems and place dem nearby. Dey should drain some of de blood magic out of de area.
De herald should be weak enough for us to actually kill after all dis.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place $1oa Sanctifying Totems down in the area.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Princess Talanji at Torga's head
